name: Rent Hike
description: Rent Hike is a game about renter survival during Seattle's housing crisis. The rent rises as the renter is faced with everyday expenses, sickness, emergencies and other obstacles. The player must resolve problems, earn money, and maintain their personal health and family relationships for as long as possible. Any failure to pay the rent, maintain health, or maintain family relationships will end the game. The object of the game is to survive as a renter for as long as possible.
